TopicTitle: Base Modules and Attachment System Wanted!

Articles.Content:
I have been playing KSP since early Beta and I am a purist - I do not like to rely on mods for various reasons.  As such, I think the stock version of KSP desperately needs an attachment system similar to KAS.  This would be extremely useful for base building, which I feel is another area to which KSP could really expand - the addition of a few different flavors (science/power/living/food, etc) of habitat modules for stations our ground bases would be an extremely welcome addition to this wonderful game.

Even if this type of content comes in the form of a paid expansion, please consider it.  Thanks.

Edited April 30, 2019 by Caelib

I'm a console player...

KSP needs a Base-builder DLC
More importantly, they need to make surface bases more stable. Current bases have a nasty tendency to explode or flip over.
